=There are two posible ways to delete a task: =

==1.From the task list page==

To delete a task from this page follow these steps:

1. Select the task you want to remove.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Gantt/GanttTaskList.png"/>

2. Click on Delete button, or press the Delete key in the keyboard. A Delete Task overlay shows up.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Gantt/GanttDeleteTaskListButton.png"/>

3. Click on Continue and Delete button.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Gantt/GanttDeleteTaskList.png"/>

==2.From the task chart page with the Delete button==

To delete a task from this page follow these steps:

1. Select the task you want to remove.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Gantt/GanttCreateTaskView.png"/>

2. Click on Delete button, or press the Delete key in the keyboard. A Delete Task overlay shows up.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Gantt/GanttDeleteTaskChartButton.png"/>

3. Click on Continue and Delete button.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Gantt/GanttDeleteTaskChart.png"/>

The task is deleted and is not displayed in the page.
